name: A Hunt For The Fae Folk
name_original: A Hunt For The Fae Folk
description:
While strolling about in the woods you've stumbled into another realm. It's denizens are mischievous and their patience is running thin. 

Hunt for 5 hidden Easter Eggs in order to regain your freedom.

Game made during a personal jam game over the Easter Weekend.

WASD - Movement. 

SHIFT - Sprint. 

SPACE - Skip Splash Screens.
